pr_title: DHFPROD-6153: Adding the buildJobPermissions to initializeEndpoint

timeline.bodyText: This needs a comment as to why it's here too - otherwise a developer is going to see it and think - why is this duplicated here!?!? So explain that we've duplicated it here because we need this to work on 5.2.x, but the function is different between 5.2 and > 5.2.
timeline.author: rjrudin

replies.bodyText: Also, I think you can get rid of the "jobs" library dependency as a result?
replies.author: rjrudin
